title: Game Time

WORTH A LOOK
N.Y. JETS VS. MIAMI
TV: CBS-6, 9:30 a.m.
Scoop: That's not a typo on the kickoff. The Jets and Dolphins meet in the first of three NFL games this season in London, where it will be 2:30 p.m. local time.

On this date
1895: Horace Rawlins wins the first U.S. Open at the Newport Golf Club in Newport, R.I. Rawlins beats Willie Dunn with a 36-hole total of 173.
